trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlNavigatorFilter" name="XmlNavigatorFilter" href=""></xref> provides a flexible filtering abstraction over <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlNavigatorFilter" name="XmlNavigatorFilter" href=""></xref>基础上提供了灵活的筛选抽象<xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Callers do not know what type of filtering will occur; they simply call <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XmlNavigatorFilter.MoveToContent*> or <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XmlNavigatorFilter.MoveToFollowingSibling*>.
trans-unit.target: 调用方不知道将出现哪种类型的筛选。它们只需调用<> *1> 或<> *1>。

trans-unit.source: The filter implementation invokes the appropriate operation on the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> in order to skip over filtered nodes.
trans-unit.target: 该筛选器实现上调用适当的操作<xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref>以便跳过筛选的节点。

trans-unit.source: Provides a flexible filtering abstraction over <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 基础上提供了灵活的筛选抽象<xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Return <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the navigator's current node matches the filter condition.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>节点导航器的当前是否与筛选条件匹配。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 实例<xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current node matches the condition, otherwise returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果当前节点与条件匹配，否则返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Repositions the navigator to the first matching content node or attribute and skips over filtered nodes.
trans-unit.target: 将重新定位到第一个匹配的内容节点或特性导航器，同时跳过筛选的节点。

trans-unit.source: If there are no matching nodes, the navigator does not move and the method returns false.
trans-unit.target: 如果不有任何匹配节点，则导航器不移动，并且该方法返回 false。

trans-unit.source: This is an abstract class and the filter, such as an element name, used to reposition the navigator is not defined by this class but by the class that derives from this class.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个抽象类，此类，但由从此类派生的类未定义的筛选器，如元素名称、 用作重新定位导航器。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 实例<xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the navigator is repositioned on a child element with a matching name, otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果导航器重定位到子元素具有匹配名称，否则<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Repositions the navigator to the following matching content node or attribute and skips over filtered nodes.
trans-unit.target: 将重新定位到以下匹配的内容节点或特性导航器，同时跳过筛选的节点。

trans-unit.source: If there are no matching nodes, the navigator does not move and the method returns false.
trans-unit.target: 如果不有任何匹配节点，则导航器不移动，并且该方法返回 false。

trans-unit.source: This is an abstract class and the filter, such as an element name, used to reposition the navigator is not defined by this class but by the class that derives from this class.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个抽象类，此类，但由从此类派生的类未定义的筛选器，如元素名称、 用作重新定位导航器。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> class that identifies the beginning of the range over which navigation can move.
trans-unit.target: 实例<xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref>标识导航可以在其中移动范围的开始处的类。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> class that identifies the end of the range over which navigation can move.
trans-unit.target: 实例<xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref>标识导航可以在其中移动范围的末尾的类。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the navigator is repositioned on the next element with a matching name, otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果导航器重定位到下一个元素与名称匹配，否则<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Repositions the navigator to the sibling matching content node or descendent and skips over filtered nodes.
trans-unit.target: 将重新定位到同级匹配的内容节点或子代导航器，同时跳过筛选的节点。

trans-unit.source: If there are no matching nodes, the navigator does not move and the method returns false.
trans-unit.target: 如果不有任何匹配节点，则导航器不移动，并且该方法返回 false。

trans-unit.source: This is an abstract class and the filter, such as an element name, used to reposition the navigator is not defined by this class but by the class that derives from this class.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个抽象类，此类，但由从此类派生的类未定义的筛选器，如元素名称、 用作重新定位导航器。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 实例<xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the navigator is repositioned on the next element sibling with a matching name, otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果导航器重定位到下一步的元素同级与名称匹配，否则<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Repositions the navigator to the next matching content node or attribute and skips over filtered nodes.
trans-unit.target: 将重新定位到下一个匹配的内容节点或特性导航器，同时跳过筛选的节点。

trans-unit.source: If there are no matching nodes, the navigator does not move and the method returns false.
trans-unit.target: 如果不有任何匹配节点，则导航器不移动，并且该方法返回 false。

trans-unit.source: This is an abstract class and the filter, such as an element name, used to reposition the navigator is not defined by this class but by the class that derives from this class.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个抽象类，此类，但由从此类派生的类未定义的筛选器，如元素名称、 用作重新定位导航器。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 实例<xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the navigator is repositioned on the next element child with a matching name, otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果导航器重定位到下一个元素子级与名称匹配，否则<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Repositions the navigator to the previous matching sibling node and skips over filtered nodes.
trans-unit.target: 将重新定位到上一个匹配的同级节点的导航器，同时跳过筛选的节点。

trans-unit.source: If there are no matching nodes, the navigator does not move and the method returns false.
trans-unit.target: 如果不有任何匹配节点，则导航器不移动，并且该方法返回 false。

trans-unit.source: This is an abstract class and the filter, such as an element name, used to reposition the navigator is not defined by this class but by the class that derives from this class.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个抽象类，此类，但由从此类派生的类未定义的筛选器，如元素名称、 用作重新定位导航器。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 实例<xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the navigator is repositioned on the previous element sibling with a matching name, otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果导航器重定位到具有匹配名称的前一元素同级否则<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
